revenueRange.label: Annual Revenue Range
revenueRange.description: Select your company's total annual revenue range
revenueRange.help: Include all revenue sources: custom homes, remodeling, and any other construction services

homesCompleted.label: Homes Completed Annually
homesCompleted.description: Number of luxury homes completed per year
homesCompleted.help: Count only completed homes, not homes under construction or in planning

profitMargin.label: Current Gross Profit Margin
profitMargin.description: Your typical gross profit margin on luxury projects
profitMargin.help: Gross profit = (Revenue - Direct Costs) รท Revenue. Include labor, materials, and subcontractors as direct costs

bottleneck.label: Biggest Business Growth Bottleneck
bottleneck.description: The primary constraint limiting your business growth and profitability
bottleneck.help: Choose the area that most limits your ability to scale and increase profits

communicationChallenge.label: Primary Business Challenge
communicationChallenge.description: The most critical issue impacting your growth and client relationships
communicationChallenge.help: Choose the challenge that has the biggest impact on your revenue and client satisfaction

options.label: Poor quality leads wasting sales time

tier1Email.label: Email Address (Optional)
tier1Email.description: Get your benchmark report via email
tier1Email.help: Optional: Receive industry comparison data and quick-win recommendations

monthlyLeads.label: Monthly Qualified Leads
monthlyLeads.description: Average number of qualified prospects per month
monthlyLeads.help: Leads who meet your project size/budget criteria and are actively looking to build

leadSources.label: Primary Lead Sources
leadSources.description: Your top 3 sources of qualified leads (select multiple)
leadSources.help: Choose your most productive lead sources. This helps us optimize your lead generation strategy

leadQualificationTime.label: Lead Qualification Time
leadQualificationTime.description: Average time to determine if a lead is qualified
leadQualificationTime.help: From first contact to knowing if they're a good fit (budget, timeline, project scope)

costPerLead.label: Average Cost Per Qualified Lead
costPerLead.description: Total marketing spend divided by qualified leads
costPerLead.help: Include all marketing costs: advertising, website, staff time, materials. Qualified leads only

conversionRate.label: Lead to Sale Conversion Rate
conversionRate.description: Percentage of qualified leads that become signed contracts
conversionRate.help: Qualified leads who become paying clients. Industry benchmark for luxury builders: 15-25%

salesCycleDays.label: Average Sales Cycle Length
salesCycleDays.description: Days from first qualified contact to signed contract
salesCycleDays.help: Time from initial qualified inquiry to contract signing. Luxury homes typically 60-180 days

presentationToCloseRate.label: Presentation to Close Rate
presentationToCloseRate.description: Percentage of formal presentations that result in contracts
presentationToCloseRate.help: After you've done a full presentation/proposal, what percentage sign contracts?

avgMeetingsToClose.label: Average Meetings to Close
avgMeetingsToClose.description: Number of meetings/touchpoints before contract signing
avgMeetingsToClose.help: Include initial consultations, design meetings, proposal presentations, negotiations

followUpEffectiveness.label: Follow-up Response Rate
followUpEffectiveness.description: Percentage of follow-up attempts that get responses
followUpEffectiveness.help: When you follow up with prospects who haven't decided, what percentage respond positively?

monthlyMarketingSpend.label: Monthly Marketing Investment
monthlyMarketingSpend.description: Total monthly marketing and advertising budget
monthlyMarketingSpend.help: Include all marketing: digital ads, print, website, trade shows, staff time on marketing activities

websiteConversionRate.label: Website Conversion Rate
websiteConversionRate.description: Percentage of website visitors who become leads
websiteConversionRate.help: Visitors who fill out contact forms, call, or otherwise express interest. Luxury builders should target 2-5%

socialMediaROI.label: Social Media Lead Generation
socialMediaROI.description: How effective is social media for generating qualified leads?
socialMediaROI.help: Specifically for qualified prospects, not just followers or engagement

options.label: Highly effective - generates 20%+ of our leads
Not currently using social media for lead gen

brandRecognition.label: Brand Recognition Rate
brandRecognition.description: Percentage of prospects who already know your company
brandRecognition.help: When meeting new prospects, what percentage have already heard of your company?

clientLifetimeValue.label: Average Client Lifetime Value
clientLifetimeValue.description: Total revenue from average client relationship
clientLifetimeValue.help: Include initial project, change orders, referrals they generate, and any repeat business

referralConversionRate.label: Referral Conversion Rate
referralConversionRate.description: Percentage of referrals that become clients
referralConversionRate.help: Referrals typically convert much higher than other lead sources. Industry average: 40-70%

repeatClientRate.label: Repeat Client Rate
repeatClientRate.description: Percentage of clients who hire you for additional projects
repeatClientRate.help: Second homes, renovations, additions within 5 years of initial project

adminHoursPerProject.label: Administrative Hours Per Project
adminHoursPerProject.description: Total admin/office hours per project completion
adminHoursPerProject.help: Include project management, client communication, scheduling, documentation, invoicing. Don't include field supervision

avgResponseTimeHours.label: Average Response Time
avgResponseTimeHours.description: Typical time to respond to client/prospect inquiries
avgResponseTimeHours.help: From when client/prospect contacts you to when you provide a substantive response. Luxury clients expect <4 hours

proposalPreparationTime.label: Proposal Preparation Time
proposalPreparationTime.description: Average hours to prepare a complete project proposal
proposalPreparationTime.help: Time from qualified lead to delivering detailed proposal/estimate. Include design time if you do preliminary design

crmUsage.label: CRM System Usage
crmUsage.description: How do you currently manage leads and client relationships?
crmUsage.help: Choose the option that best describes your current system

leadTrackingAccuracy.label: Lead Tracking Accuracy
leadTrackingAccuracy.description: Percentage of leads properly tracked from source to outcome
leadTrackingAccuracy.help: Can you accurately track where leads come from and what happens to them? Critical for ROI analysis

automationCurrentLevel.label: Current Automation Level
automationCurrentLevel.description: How much of your sales/marketing process is automated?
automationCurrentLevel.help: Automation includes email sequences, lead scoring, appointment scheduling, follow-ups

options.label: Significant automation (most processes have some automation)

growthGoal.label: Primary Growth Objective
growthGoal.description: Your main business growth goal for the next 2 years
growthGoal.help: Choose the most important growth objective that drives your decision-making

options.label: Scale operations to handle more volume

topPriority.label: Top Priority for Improvement
topPriority.description: The most important area where you want to see immediate improvement
topPriority.help: Choose the single most important area where improvement would have the biggest business impact

painPoint.label: Biggest Business Challenge
painPoint.description: Describe your most critical business challenge impacting growth or profitability
painPoint.help: Be specific about the problem, its impact on revenue/operations, and what you've tried to solve it
painPoint.placeholder: e.g., 'We get plenty of inquiries but only 12% convert to contracts. We spend hours qualifying leads that turn out to be tire-kickers, and our sales process is inconsistent across team members...'

tier2Email.label: Professional Email Address
tier2Email.description: Where should we send your custom analysis report?
tier2Email.help: You'll receive a detailed PDF report within 24 hours with specific recommendations for your lead generation and sales optimization
